attributes.action: (U.K.) State Body Governmental Accountability to The UN CRPD Convention
attributes.additional_details:
A report was done in 2016 on the state of support and welfare for disabled people in the (U.K.) CRPD Report CRPD/C/15/R.2/Rev.1
Link:-
http://www.ohchr.org/Documents/HRBodies/CRPD/CRPD.C.15.R.2.Rev.1-ENG.doc

The report stated the member state being the (U.K.) needed to comply to UN Security Councils recommendations, in regards to disability equalities and rights breaches covered by the (UN) CRPD.

A following Report:-
http://researchbriefings.files.parliament.uk/documents/CBP-7367/CBP-7367.pdf
attributes.background:
In 2016 a report was conducted on the state of support and welfare for disabled people in the U.K. CRPD Report CRPD/C/15/R.2/Rev.1 Convention on the Right’s Of person’s with disabilities. http://www.ohchr.org/Documents/HRBodies/CRPD/CRPD.C.15.R.2.Rev.1-ENG.doc 

Solution suggested accountability.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
